name: Crash Landing Demo X
description:
Crash Landing is a 3d jump and slide action game set in a frozen fantasy land. Play as one of the Maji- a lost race of water wielding warriors who face off against the alien forces that have invaded the icy environment. Use air tricks, dodges, hydro blasts and slide combos to score points for buy upgrades and new levels.

-CONTROLLER SUPPORT-

This version of the demo has controls to the default Xbox layout in windows. If you don't have an Xbox controller, you can try installing x360ce to emulate one, however this can cause a double input issue. Crash Landing Demo S is configured to the default Dualshock 4 layout in windows.
